snippet: The decision to scrub the annual race because of Hurricane Sandy will have a huge impact on New York Road Runners and the city.
abstract: Decision to scrub New York City Marathon due to Hurricane Sandy will have a huge impact on the New York Road Runners and the city; marathon was expected to generate $340 million in spending for New York and more than half of the Road Runners' $60 million in annual revenue.

byline.original: By LIZ ROBBINS and KEN BELSON

lead_paragraph: The decision to scrub the annual race because of Hurricane Sandy will have a huge impact on New York Road Runners and the city.

headline.seo: Marathon’s Cancellation Sure to Carry Huge Costs
headline.main: Costs of Canceling Marathon Are Uncounted but Immense
headline.print_headline: Costs of Canceling Marathon Are Uncounted but Immense
